title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. X, pt. 458 - Minimum Insulation And Heating System Standards
content:

State Regulations
§ 458.1 - Application
§ 458.2 - Minimum insulation and heating system standards for existing buildings or mobile homes converting to electric heat
§ 458.3 - Enforcement of compliance with construction standards of State Energy Conservation Construction Code

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. X, pt. 458

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §1004

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
